医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新项目探讨南美精神病院去机构化的影响一个重大的新研究项目将探讨南美洲心理健康治疗的转型变化的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-project-to-explore-impact-of-psychiatric-deinstitutionalization-in-South-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-project-to-explore-impact-of-psychiatric-deinstitutionalization-in-South-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3bbcd38-7449-4613-a3ef-3febc86618f6 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:55:53 -0500 New project to explore impact of psychiatric deinstitutionalization in South America
长期关闭急症护理医院可能会对患者护理产生意想不到的后果长期急性护理医院 (LTCH) 是对需要长期机械通气的严重呼吸衰竭康复患者进行急性后护理的常见场所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Long-term-acute-care-hospital-closures-may-have-unintending-consequences-for-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Long-term-acute-care-hospital-closures-may-have-unintending-consequences-for-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd66abd6-cccd-4831-9628-1c0c409d068d Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:50:50 -0500 Long-term acute care hospital closures may have unintended consequences for patient care
2022 年欧洲因高温死亡人数可能超过 70,000 人巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 领导的一项研究显示，2022 年夏季，欧洲因酷热而死亡的人数可能超过 70,000 人。该研究所是一家由“la Caixa”基金会支持的研究中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Heat-lated-mortality-in-Europe-may-have-exceeded-70000-in-2022.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Heat-lated-mortality-in-Europe-may-have-exceeded-70000-in-2022.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3986658e-9801-4b5f-96ff-aba5987d58f3 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:43:06 -0500 Heat-related mortality in Europe may have exceeded 70,000 in 2022
PROFID EHRA 试验旨在个性化预防心肌梗死后心源性猝死第一项针对患有心力衰竭的心肌梗塞幸存者常规植入除颤器的挑战的临床试验已经招募了第一位患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/PROFID-EHRA-trial-aims-to-personalize-the-prevention-of-sudden-cardiac-death-after-myocardial-infarction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/PROFID-EHRA-Trial-aims-to-personalize-the-prevention-of-sudden-cardiac-death-after-myocardial-infarction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=907e2fdd-32da-4613-84f7-ef0b1cb9dc84 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:33:31 -0500 PROFID EHRA trial aims to personalize the prevention of sudden cardiac death after myocardial infarction
高精度绘制半月板血管网络对半月板软骨进行的膝盖手术是对人体特别复杂的部位进行的常见手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Mapping-blood-vessel-network-of-the-meniscus-with-high- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Mapping-blood-vessel-network-of-the-meniscus-with-high- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcdbc38d-a56b-4e8c-970c-4ac23a66c502 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:30:21 -0500 Mapping blood vessel network of the meniscus with high precision
极端狂热与大脑活动变化有关根据下周在北美放射学会年会上发表的研究，足球迷在观看比赛时表现出不同的大脑激活模式，可能会引发积极和消极的情绪和行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Extreme-fanaticism-linked-to-changes-in-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Extreme-fanaticism-linked-to-changes-in-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03d8c3e7-37e5-4b5f-bbaa-2738d7ec477d Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:26:16 -0500 Extreme fanaticism linked to changes in brain activity
人类行为可能推动新冠病毒毒株的进化名古屋大学领导的一个研究小组利用人工智能技术和数学模型揭示，封锁和隔离措施等人类行为会影响新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 病毒株的进化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Human-behavior-may-drive-the-evolution-of-new-coronavirus-strains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Human-behavior-may-drive-the-evolution-of-new-coronavirus-strains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59851d71-02f2-4014-bb2f-f0b2889326f9 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:23:28 -0500 Human behavior may drive the evolution of new coronavirus strains
基于尿液的新型预后模型有望改变膀胱癌的治疗在《基因与疾病》杂志上发表的一项研究中，复旦大学的研究人员开发了一种新型的基于尿液的预后模型，有望改变膀胱癌的管理和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Novel-urine-based-prognostic-model-promises-to-transform-b​​ladder-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Novel-urine-based-prognostic-model-promises-to-transform-b​​ladder-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19421b85-a0db-427b-87c1-475b998c27d4 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:14:58 -0500 Novel urine-based prognostic model promises to transform bladder cancer treatment
人工智能和合成患者可以使慢性疲劳综合症的早期诊断更加可行全球有 17 至 2400 万人患有慢性疲劳综合症，这是一种使人严重衰弱且难以诊断的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/AI-and-synthetic-病人-could-make-early-diagnosis-of-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-more-feasible.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/AI-and-synthetic-病人-could-make-early-diagnosis-of-chronic-fatigue-syndrome-more-feasible.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c46087a7-4b6c-49fd-a152-2e513cb7ecdd Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:10:54 -0500 AI and synthetic patients could make early diagnosis of chronic fatigue syndrome more feasible
民意调查显示，五分之四的父母向社交媒体寻求育儿建议如厕训练、让孩子入睡和幼儿发脾气只是幼儿父母面临的一些挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Four-in- Five-parents-turn-to-social-media-for-parenting-advice-poll-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Four-in- Five-parents-turn-to-social-media-for-parenting-advice-poll-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e48513e-4c1e-435a-b4be-3ef4dbee9028 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:03:03 -0500 Four in five parents turn to social media for parenting advice, poll shows
